global.title: TransAndalus
global.browsehappy: You are using an outdated browser. Please upgrade your browser to improve your experience.

info.authenticated:
If you want to sign in, you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

newpassword.minlength: Your password is required to be at least 5 characters.
newpassword.maxlength: Your password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

confirmpassword.minlength: Your confirmation password is required to be at least 5 characters.
confirmpassword.maxlength: Your confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters.

email.minlength: Your e-mail is required to be at least 5 characters.
email.maxlength: Your e-mail cannot be longer than 50 characters.

traveler1.name: Beatriz
traveler1.text: The route is fantastic, but what is really worth is go cicling to Madrid to know Bernaco, marvellous man.

traveler2.name: Patricia
traveler2.text: My hair will be bright forever, so I travel in my bike without helmet and full of leg hair. What will I do without Transandalus?

traveler3.name: Juan
traveler3.text: The route is long, but is good and not expensive. I miss some world championship downhill to ride with my bags. I encourage you to visit Alcolea.

volunteers.title: Who has made it possible
volunteers.text: TransAndalus is a non-profit organization, which is born and grows thanks of its volunteers efforts. If you want to cooperate with this beautiful project you can make a donation or help us. Contact us!

sponsors.title: Organized trips
sponsors.text: The following companies, apart from the Transandalus Association, provide different services to organize a bike trip through the Transandalus (bike rental, GPS, material, luggage transport,...). Consult in their respective pages for such services and conditions.
